colors_product_cards_price.label: Price
colors_product_cards_price.info: Normal price, when there is no discount.

colors_product_cards_price_final_discoun.label: Discounted price
colors_product_cards_price_final_discoun.info: Final price, after the discount has been applied.

colors_aux_heading.info: Affects auxiliary buttons, slider arrows, and tabs in sections.

header_prices.info: Affects the price colors in all sections except product cards. Prices on product cards can be edited in the color schemes.

price_color.label: Price
price_color.info: Normal price, when there is no discount.

price_final_discounted_color.label: Discounted price
price_final_discounted_color.info: Final price, after the discount has been applied.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

breadcrumbs_enabled.label: Enable breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs_enabled.info: Breadcrumbs will appear on all pages of your website, except from the home page, cart page, collections list page, 404 page, and password page.

border_style.label: Border style
border_style.info: Sets the border style of all cards, and other elements in the store.

catalog_enabled.label: Catalog mode
catalog_enabled.info: In catalog mode, no cart-related features are displayed. This even overrides individual options such as the “Add to cart” button on listings, or the “Buy buttons” block on the product page.

login_for_price_enabled.label: Log in to view price
login_for_price_enabled.info: When enabled, product prices, “Add to cart” buttons, and other cart-related features, are hidden unless the customer is logged in. This feature is not applicable when “Catalog mode” is enabled. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/setting-up-login-to-view-price/)

button_top_enabled.label: Enable scroll to top button
button_top_enabled.info: Only applies on desktop. The scroll to top button will appear on all pages of your website as soon as a visitor scrolls down the page. Clicking the button will scroll to the top of the website.

remove_card_ribbon.label: Remove card ribbon
remove_card_ribbon.info: Removes the decorative ribbon on the top left of card layouts in some sections (collection lists, banners, etc).

buttons_shape.label: Shape
buttons_shape.info: This setting will also affect the shape of color swatches and variation buttons

only_x_left.label: Last items threshold
only_x_left.info: When a variant's inventory is less that or equal to this number, a “Only X left” badge will appear instead of the “In Stock” badge. Set to 0 to disable.

show_items_in_stock.label: Show number of items
show_items_in_stock.info: “In Stock” badge shows the number of items in catalog and product pages, regardless of the threshold set above. Only applies on products where “Track quantity” is enabled.

header_1.info: To use this custom badge, add a product metafield with the namespace and key “custom.custom_badge_1” and the “Single line text” type. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/theme-settings/badges-settings/#custom-badges).

header_2.info: To use this custom badge, add a product metafield with the namespace and key “custom.custom_badge_2” and the “Single line text” type. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/theme-settings/badges-settings/#custom-badges).

custom_badge_days_ago.label: Days ago published
custom_badge_days_ago.info: Show this custom badge on products that were published within the specified number of days. Set to “0” to disable this feature.

paragraph_1.content: You can display color swatches or images in place of product options or collection/search filters. You can use either colors or images. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/color-swatches/)

swatches_on_products.label: Enable on product page / featured product
swatches_on_products.info: “Variation picker type” must be set to “Button”.

swatches_on_product_listings.label: Enable on product cards
swatches_on_product_listings.info: This will enable color swatches on all product listings.

swatches_on_product_listings_max.label: Maximum swatches on product cards
swatches_on_product_listings_max.info: The maximum number of color swatches to display on product cards. When a product has more colors, a “+ 2 more” link is displayed.

option_swatches.label: Options
option_swatches.info: Product options with these names will become color swatches. Separate them using a comma “,”. Include alternative spellings and languages if needed.

color_swatches.label: Colors
color_swatches.info: Option values with these names will show the respective color. Separate the option name from the color code using a colon “:”. Enter each pair in a separate line. Include alternative spellings and languages if needed.

color_swatches_shape.label: Shape
color_swatches_shape.info: Applies to both swatches and visual filters.

visual_filters_columns.label: Visual filters columns
visual_filters_columns.info: Only applies on image-based visual filters [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/set-up-collection-filters-for-your-store#visual-filters)

paragraph_1.content: The following options only apply when product suggestions are enabled.

predictive_search_limit_scope.label: “Number of results” applies to these result types
predictive_search_limit_scope.info: E.g. All: Up to 5 results total. Each: Up to 5 products, 5 collections, etc.

products_two_column_mobile.label: Two columns on mobile
products_two_column_mobile.info: Display products in two columns instead of one in collections.

filters_scroll_top.label: Scroll to top after filter selection
filters_scroll_top.info: Scroll to the top of the content after selecting a filter in collections and the search template.

all_products_hero_disabled.label: Hide “All Products” hero banner
all_products_hero_disabled.info: The hero banner in the “All Products” template will be hidden.

product_cards_truncate_title_chars.label: Truncate product titles
product_cards_truncate_title_chars.info: Enter an amount of characters after which titles in product cards, cart, and search results will be truncated. Leave blank to disable.

products_show_secondary_image.label: Show second image on hover
products_show_secondary_image.info: Product cards across all listings will reveal their second image on hover if it exists.

product_placeholder_image.label: Placeholder image
product_placeholder_image.info: The placeholder image will be displayed on products that don't have an image assigned.

product_image_crop.label: Enable image crop
product_image_crop.info: Disable this if you want product images to be displayed in full and not cropped. When the image ratio is set to “Adapt to image”, this option has no effect.

products_show_add_to_cart.label: Show “Add to cart” button
products_show_add_to_cart.info: The button will be visible on each product and on all product grids, such as on collections, related products, etc. When there are multiple variants, a “Select options” or “Quick view” button will be shown instead.

quickview_no_variants_text.label: Products without variants Quick view button text
quickview_no_variants_text.info: Leave empty to use the default text

quickview_variants_text.label: Products with variants Quick view button text
quickview_variants_text.info: Leave empty to use the default text

products_hide_empty_star_rating.label: Hide ratings when there are no reviews
products_hide_empty_star_rating.info: When a product has no reviews, the star rating will be hidden in product grids such as collections, related products, etc.

paragraph_1.content: Show currency codes after prices. Example: $1.00 USD.

paragraph_2.content: Text that follows the price when it includes taxes.

social_link_whatsapp.label: WhatsApp
social_link_whatsapp.info: Full phone number in international format. Omit any symbols, brackets, or dashes. E.g. “+1 (555) 123-4567” should be entered as “15551234567”.

free_shipping_enabled.label: Show free shipping message
free_shipping_enabled.info: Enabling this will only display a message on the mini cart, as well as the cart page. You will need to configure your shipping rates accordingly for free shipping to take effect.

free_shipping_threshold.label: Free shipping threshold
free_shipping_threshold.info: Enter the minimum amount required for free shipping. Enter just a number, no currency symbol or any other text.

cart_policy_consent_page.label: Enable policy consent in cart
cart_policy_consent_page.info: Select a policy page to enable the consent checkbox in the mini cart and main cart templates.

minicart_append_coupon_codes.label: Allow multiple coupons
minicart_append_coupon_codes.info: When disabled, only the latest coupon code entered will be remembered. When enabled, all coupon codes entered will be remembered. The applicability of each coupon code depends on its configuration.

card_clickable_desktop.label: Entire card is clickable on desktop
card_clickable_desktop.info: Desktop only. The entire card is clickable by default on mobile.

filters_bar_sticky.label: Enable sticky filters bar on mobile
filters_bar_sticky.info: Filters bar is visible on the screen as customers scroll on mobile.

heading.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

card_ratio.label: Card ratio
card_ratio.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

header_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

heading_tag.label: Heading tag
heading_tag.info: For SEO. Leave as is unless you know why you're changing it.

hide_if_empty.info: When enabled, the whole section will be hidden on the front-end, unless there is meaningful output. Best used with dynamic sources.

hide_block_if_empty.info: When enabled, the block will be hidden on the front-end, unless there is meaningful output. Best used with dynamic sources.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there is no text

layout.label: Media placement
layout.info: Only applies to desktop. In smaller screens the media will always come first.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no images

button_1_label.label: Button 1 label
button_1_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_2_label.label: Button 2 label
button_2_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

columns.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks' images and custom videos are empty

video_url.label: External video URL (YouTube, Vimeo)
video_url.info: Optionally display a video for this banner.

custom_video.label: Self hosted video
custom_video.info: The self hosted video will take priority over the external URL.

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no blog posts

auto_rotate.label: Auto-rotate slides
auto_rotate.info: Only applies on the Slider layout or when “Stack on mobile” is off.

change_slides_speed.label: Rotate every
change_slides_speed.info: Only applies on the Slider layout or when “Stack on mobile” is off.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no brands

custom_video.label: Self hosted background video
custom_video.info: The self hosted video will take priority over the external URL.

video_url.label: External URL (YouTube, Vimeo)
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL as the background video.

video_description.label: Video description
video_description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

content_width.label: Content width %
content_width.info: Only applies on desktop. The maximum width (in percentage) of the call to action’s content (heading and description).

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there is no text and link

columns.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no collections

image.label: Image
image.info: Optional. The selected image will be displayed instead of the collection's image.

video_url.label: External video URL (YouTube, Vimeo)
video_url.info: Optionally display a video for this collection.

custom_video.label: Self hosted video
custom_video.info: The self hosted video will take priority over the external URL.

button_text.label: Button label
button_text.info: Optional. Use custom text for the button.

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

hide_placeholders.label: Hide section if there are no collections displayed

content_width.label: Content width %
content_width.info: Only applies on desktop. The maximum width (in percentage) of the section’s content.

end_time.label: End time
end_time.info: Format: 14:00 (24-hour clock). Uses the store's timezone. Optional. If no end time is entered the section will use midnight.

hide_on_expiration.label: Hide the entire section when the expiration date has passed.

expiration_message.label: Expiration message
expiration_message.info: Display a message to your customers when the expiration date has passed. If the section is hidden when expired, this has no effect.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there is no text

box_align.info: Applies only when no product is featured.

content_width.label: Content width %
content_width.info: Only applies on desktop. The maximum width (in percentage) of the section’s content.

product.label: Product
product.info: Optionally choose to feature one product on the countdown timer section.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

hide_on_mobile.label: Hide on mobile
hide_on_mobile.info: Control the visibility of the featured product on mobile devices.

end_time.label: End time
end_time.info: Format: 14:00 (24-hour clock). Uses the store's timezone. Optional. If no end time is entered the section will use midnight.

hide_on_expiration.label: Hide the entire section when the expiration date has passed.

expiration_message.label: Expiration message
expiration_message.info: Display a message to your customers when the expiration date has passed. If the section is hidden when expired, this has no effect.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there is no text
Hide section if there are no collections

image.label: Image
image.info: Optional. The selected image will be displayed instead of the collection's image.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no collections

products.label: Products
products.info: You may also select any specific products that you want displayed, instead of the ones displayed automatically by choosing a collection. In this case, the “Number of products” option is ignored.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no blocks with text

products.label: Products
products.info: You may also select any specific products that you want displayed, instead of the ones displayed automatically by choosing a collection. In this case, the “Number of products” option is ignored.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

show_collection.label: Show collection card
show_collection.info: Collection card is displayed as the last item.

header-collection-card.info: Override the collection card's values by providing your own.

collection_image.label: Image
collection_image.info: Optional. The selected image will be displayed instead of the collection's image.

hide_placeholders.label: Hide section if there are no products displayed

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there is no product

links_new_window.label: Open links in a new window
links_new_window.info: Applies only in custom links, not product cards.

product_compact.label: Compact product layout
product_compact.info: Applies when products are selected in hotspots.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if image or blocks are empty

product.label: Product
product.info: Selecting a product will override the above custom text, description, and image settings.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants' media after selecting a variant

arrow_navigation.label: Show gallery navigation arrows on mobile
arrow_navigation.info: Applies on mobile only. Displays navigation arrows on products with more than one image in the main gallery.

thumbnail_navigation.label: Show thumbnail navigation arrows
thumbnail_navigation.info: Applies on desktop only. Displays navigation arrows on products with a lot of thumbnails in the thumbnail carousel.

image_zoom_type.label: Image zoom
image_zoom_type.info: Applies on desktop only (except for the “None” option). On mobile, the image zooms always in the lightbox.

image_disclaimer.label: Images disclaimer
image_disclaimer.info: Optionally provide a disclaimer message regarding the product images.

collapse_other_expandables.label: Collapse other expandables
collapse_other_expandables.info: When an expandable block is expanded, collapse all other blocks.

show_bottom_divider.label: Add a divider at the bottom of this block

show_rating.label: Show rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

hide_empty_star_rating.label: Hide rating when there are no reviews

hide_single_variant.label: Hide single variant
hide_single_variant.info: In some cases, products have options (e.g. size), however only one variant is available (e.g. One size fits all). This option hides the Variant picker in these cases.

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent directly to a recipient along with a personal message.

paragraph_1.content: To set complementary products, use the free Shopify “Search & Discovery” app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

position.label: Position
position.info: Select the positioning of the block. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/product-page/)

expanded.label: Start expanded
expanded.info: Blocks become expandable only when positioned on the left, and only if they have a title or an icon.

image.label: Image
image.info: For best appearance, use a square image of at least 320 pixels in width and height.

position.label: Position
position.info: Select the positioning of the block. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/product-page/)

expanded.label: Start expanded
expanded.info: Blocks become expandable only when positioned on the left, and only if they have a title or an icon.

metafields.label: Metafields
metafields.info: Enter pairs of titles and metafields. Separate the title from the metafield key code using a colon “:”. Enter each pair in a separate line.

text.label: Text
text.info: Optional text to display before or after the metafields.

consent_checkbox.label: Enable consent checkbox
consent_checkbox.info: Require your customers to explicitly consent before subscribing with their email.

alignment.label: Alignment
alignment.info: Applies only when the image is smaller than the container.

description.label: Description
description.info: Provide additional information or instructions for this field.

name.label: Field name
name.info: Required. The customer-provided value will be associated with this name, and will be visible on both the cart and the order. Avoid using separators such as “:” and “-”

value.label: Value
value.info: Enter an integer or decimal number (e.g. “2” or “3.7”) or connect to a metafield. If empty, the block will be hidden.

end_time.label: End time
end_time.info: Format: 14:00 (24-hour clock). Uses the store's timezone. Optional. If no end time is entered the section will use midnight.

hide_on_expiration.label: Hide the entire block when the expiration date has passed

expiration_message.label: Expiration message
expiration_message.info: Display a message to your customers when the expiration date has passed. If the section is hidden when expired, this has no effect.

show_on_sale.label: Show only on sale
show_on_sale.info: When enabled, the countdown timer will only be displayed on variants that are on sale.

image_position.label: Image position
image_position.info: Applies on desktop only. On mobile, the images revert to the top of the banner.

image_ratio.info: Applies when the “Image position” is set to “Top”.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks have no image or text

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

header_1.info: Upload an image instead of displaying a live Google map.

image_link.label: Image link
image_link.info: Optionally link the image to a URL.

google_maps_api_key.label: Google Maps API key
google_maps_api_key.info: You'll need to enable both [Google Maps](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key) and [Geocoding](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/geocoding#GetStarted) APIs to display the map.

zoom.label: Map zoom level
zoom.info: Used only when you have one location or when navigating to a location. When there are multiple locations the map will automatically load at the optimal zoom level.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if locations are empty

address_info_window.label: Marker info
address_info_window.info: If provided it will replace the Address label in the location's marker bubble when clicked.

inline.label: Show inline
inline.info: Disable card layout and show features inline.

auto_rotate.label: Auto-rotate in mobile
auto_rotate.info: Automatically rotate the features in mobile. Applies when the features are not stacked in mobile.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks' text is empty

image.label: Image
image.info: If none of the icons suit you, you can upload a custom 40 x 40px image.

collections.label: Collections
collections.info: Leave empty to search through your entire store.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no filters

title.label: Filter name
title.info: This must exactly match the name of the filter.

header_1.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

logo_homepage_tag.label: Logo tag on homepage
logo_homepage_tag.info: Leave as is, unless you know know what you're doing.

header_2.info: Contact details are displayed next to the search bar.

menu_mobile.label: Mobile menu
menu_mobile.info: Optional. If left empty, it will default to the combined contents of the main and secondary menus. It is best practice to leave empty and use the same menu as desktop. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/search/mobile-sites/mobile-first-indexing).

menu_mobile_expand_on_arrow.label: Mobile sub-menus expand on arrow click
menu_mobile_expand_on_arrow.info: If enabled only the arrows of mobile menu items will expand submenus.

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header is visible on the screen as customers scroll up.

sticky_header_always_on.label: Sticky header always on
sticky_header_always_on.info: Header is always visible on the screen. Requires sticky header to be enabled.

collapse_navigation.label: Collapse navigation
collapse_navigation.info: Collapse the main navigation when the header is stuck to the top.

mini_cart_show_totals.label: Display total price in the icon

redirect_to_cart.label: Redirect to cart page after adding a product to cart
redirect_to_cart.info: Enabling this will redirect the customer to the cart page instead of opening the mini cart after adding a product.

search_label.label: Icon label
search_label.info: Visible only when the search is shown as icon

menu_font.label: Menus should use the font from

main_menu_nav_font_size.label: Main navigation font size
main_menu_nav_font_size.info: The main navigation font size will still be affected from the global font size scale setting.

menu_main_align_center.label: Make menu items center aligned
menu_main_align_center.info: Only applies if a secondary menu is not set.

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Enter a first-level menu item to transform its children to a mega menu.

header_side_items.info: Choose between up to four products, or up to four collections, or up to four custom side items.

badge_menu_item.label: Menu item
badge_menu_item.info: Enter a first-level menu item to apply the badge to (case sensitive).

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks' images are missing

mobile_image.label: Mobile image
mobile_image.info: This image will be used on mobile devices.

description.label: Image description
description.info: Describe the image for customers using screen readers.

position.label: Position
position.info: Position of notifications on the screen

horizontal_margin.label: Horizontal margin
horizontal_margin.info: Distance from the left or right edge of the screen. Applies on desktop only.

vertical_margin.label: Vertical margin
vertical_margin.info: Distance from the top or bottom edge of the screen.

visibility.label: Device visibility
visibility.info: Control which devices notifications are displayed on.

session_persistence.label: Show once per session
session_persistence.info: When enabled, notifications will only be shown once per browsing session. Overrides the “Delay between cycles” setting.

display_time.label: Display time
display_time.info: How long each message will be displayed.

delay.label: Initial delay
delay.info: Delay before showing the first message.

between_delay.label: Delay between messages
between_delay.info: Time to wait between individual messages.

cycle_delay.label: Delay between cycles
cycle_delay.info: Time to wait before starting the cycle again. Set to 0 to show messages only once, without repeating.

paragraph_1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph_2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

show_image.label: Show image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

paragraph_1.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

append_coupon_codes.label: Allow multiple coupons
append_coupon_codes.info: When disabled, only the latest coupon code entered will be remembered. When enabled, all coupon codes entered will be remembered. The applicability of each coupon code depends on its configuration.

show_shipping_calculator.label: Enable shipping calculator
show_shipping_calculator.info: The shipping calculator displays estimated shipping costs.

paragraph_1.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use a 1420 x 180px image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#crop-an-image)

collection_description_fullwidth.label: Make description fullwidth
collection_description_fullwidth.info: By default the description will be limited to half the available width. Enable this option to make it fullwidth.

description_lines_to_show.label: Number of lines to show
description_lines_to_show.info: Set the number of lines to display when the description is collapsed. Set to 0 to show the full description.

show_product_size.label: Show number of products in collection title

products_layout_rows_highlight_color.label: Row highlight color
products_layout_rows_highlight_color.info: Product rows will be highlighted with this color when hovered.

desktop_product_columns.info: Applies only to the “Grid” layout. Mobile columns are controlled globally.

enable_filters_toggle.label: Enable filters toggle
enable_filters_toggle.info: Provide the option for customers to show or hide the filters. Requires that filtering is enabled.

filters_toggle_default.label: Filters toggle default
filters_toggle_default.info: Select whether to show the filters by default or not when the filters toggle is enabled.

header_3.info: These options only apply to the “Grid” products layout.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

hide_empty_filters.label: Hide empty filters
hide_empty_filters.info: Hide filters when they contain no products instead of disabling them.

side_menu_expand_on_arrow.label: Side menu sub-menus expand on arrow click
side_menu_expand_on_arrow.info: If enabled only the arrows of sub menu items will expand sub-menus.

paragraph_1.content: This block only works with the “Grid” products layout.

banner_position.label: Position
banner_position.info: The banner will appear before the specified product number.

hide_on_filtered.label: Hide banner when the collection is filtered

hide_if_empty.label: Hide banner if there is no image

row_position.label: Row position
row_position.info: The banner will appear after the specified row number. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/templates/collections/#collection-inline-banner)

hide_on_filtered.label: Hide banner when the collection is filtered

hide_if_empty.label: Hide banner if there is no image

collections_per_page.label: Collections per page
collections_per_page.info: Does not apply when “Show collections” is set to “Selected”

newsletter_enabled.label: Show newsletter form
newsletter_enabled.info: Display the newsletter signup form instead of the password field.

enable_filters_toggle.label: Enable filters toggle
enable_filters_toggle.info: Provide the option for customers to show or hide the filters. Requires that filtering is enabled.

filters_toggle_default.label: Filters toggle default
filters_toggle_default.info: Select whether to show the filters by default or not when the filters toggle is enabled.

show_product_count.label: Show search term and results count

hide_empty_filters.label: Hide empty filters
hide_empty_filters.info: Hide filters when they contain no products instead of disabling them.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

image.label: Image
image.info: The image will be the video cover, if a video is used.

video_url.label: Video URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL
video_url.info: Leave this empty to only display the image.

layout.label: Media placement
layout.info: Only applies to desktop. In smaller screens the media will always come first.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there is no image or text

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks have no image or text

header_1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

consent_checkbox.label: Enable consent checkbox
consent_checkbox.info: Require your customers to explicitly consent before subscribing with their email.

show_current_product.label: Show current product first
show_current_product.info: When enabled, the currently visible product will be displayed first in the comparison list. Only applies when the section is displayed on product pages.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are less than two products

truncate_chars.label: Truncate description
truncate_chars.info: Enter an amount of characters after which the description of the product will be truncated. Leave blank to disable.

alignment.label: Alignment
alignment.info: Applies only when the image is smaller than the container.

metafields.label: Metafields
metafields.info: Enter pairs of titles and metafields. Separate the title from the metafield key code using a colon “:”. Enter each pair in a separate line.

text.label: Text
text.info: Optional text to display before or after the metafields.

metafield.label: Metafield
metafield.info: Enter a metafield namespace.key path, like “custom.watts” or “variant.custom.material”

value.label: Value
value.info: Enter an integer or decimal number (e.g. “2” or “3.7”) or connect to a metafield. If empty, the block will be hidden.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks have no products

columns.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

paragraph_1.content: Only use this section if you already have set custom recommendations for each product individually, using [product metafields](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/add-custom-product-recommendations/).

paragraph_2.content: If not, you should use the “Product recommendations” section, along with the “Shopify Search & Discovery” app instead. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there is no text

accessibility_info.label: Slideshow description
accessibility_info.info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no images

content_width.label: Content width %
content_width.info: Only applies on desktop. The maximum width (in percentage) of the slide’s content.

button_label.label: Primary button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the primary button.

button_type_link.label: Display the primary button as text link

button_color_scheme.label: Primary button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

secondary_button_label.label: Secondary button label
secondary_button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the secondary button.

secondary_button_type_link.label: Display the secondary button as text link

secondary_button_color_scheme.label: Secondary button color scheme
secondary_button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

auto_rotate.label: Auto-rotate slides
auto_rotate.info: Only applies on the Slider layout or when “Stack on mobile” is off.

change_slides_speed.label: Rotate every
change_slides_speed.info: Only applies on the Slider layout or when “Stack on mobile” is off.

enable_image_crop.label: Enable image crop
enable_image_crop.info: Disable this if you want the images to be displayed in full and not cropped. When the image ratio is set to “Adapt to image”, this option has no effect.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there are no images

description.label: Image description
description.info: Describe the image for customers using screen readers.

link_new_window.label: Open link in a new window

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks have no text

page.label: Page
page.info: If a page is selected, it will override the tab's content setting.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks have no media or text

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image.label: Image
image.info: The image will be the video cover, if a video is used.

video_url.label: Video URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

layout.label: Media placement
layout.info: Only applies to desktop. In smaller screens the media will always come first.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if blocks have no text

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Description
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there's no video

button_label.label: Primary button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the primary button.

button_type_link.label: Display the primary button as text link

button_color_scheme.label: Primary button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

secondary_button_label.label: Secondary button label
secondary_button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the secondary button.

secondary_button_type_link.label: Display the secondary button as text link

secondary_button_color_scheme.label: Secondary button color scheme
secondary_button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

custom_video.label: Self hosted video
custom_video.info: The self hosted video will take priority over the external URL

video_url.label: External URL (YouTube, Vimeo)
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

video_description.label: Video description
video_description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

hide_if_empty.label: Hide section if there's no video

delay.label: Appearance delay
delay.info: Number of seconds the pop-up will delay to be displayed for your customers. Setting this to “0” will display the pop-up immediately.

expiration_date.label: Countdown date
expiration_date.info: Enter a date in the following format: yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm:ss

hide_on_expiration.label: Hide section after the countdown has expired

expiration_message.label: Expiration message
expiration_message.info: Display a message to your customers if the countdown has expired. If the section is hidden when expired, this has no effect.

consent_checkbox.label: Enable consent checkbox
consent_checkbox.info: Require your customers to explicitly consent before subscribing with their email.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/themes/athens/guides/product-ratings/)

delay.label: Delay
delay.info: Delay in seconds before the age verification appears

enable_storage.label: Remember verification
enable_storage.info: Saves verification status to prevent showing the age verification again.

storage_expiration.label: Storage expiration
storage_expiration.info: Number of days before showing the age verification again.

rejection_message.label: Rejection message
rejection_message.info: Message shown when the user clicks the “No” button.

minimum_variants.label: Minimum variants
minimum_variants.info: The section will only be visible if the product has at least this many variants. Set this to 1 if you want the section to always be visible.

pagination.label: Pagination
pagination.info: When disabled, all variants (up to a maximum of 250) will be displayed.
